nodes.name: calculateInterestPayment
calculatePoolEnter
calculatePoolExit
calculatePoolExitInverse

params.lAmountMin: Minimal amount of liquid tokens to cover by this pledge      * There is a case, when pAmount is too high for this debt, in this case only part of pAmount will be used. In such edge case we may return less then lAmountMin, but price limit lAmountMin/pAmount will be honored.
params.pAmount: Amount of pTokens to use as collateral

params.interest: Annual interest rate multiplied by INTEREST_MULTIPLIER

params.supporter: Address of supporter to check. If supporter == borrower, special rules applied.

calculatePledgeInfo(address,uint256,addr.return: current pledge state:     pLocked - locked pTokens     pUnlocked - unlocked pTokens (including already withdrawn)     pInterest - received interest     pWithdrawn - amount of already withdrawn pTokens

params.debtLAmount: Amount of debt in liquid tokens
params.interest: Annual interest rate multiplied by INTEREST_MULTIPLIER (to allow decimal numbers)
params.lAmountMin: Minimal amount of liquid tokens used as collateral.
params.pAmount: Amount of pTokens to use as collateral

executeDebtProposal(uint256).details: Creates Debt using data of DebtProposal

getDebtRequiredPayments(address,uint256).return: Amount of unpaid debt, amount of interest payment

getRequiredPledge(address,uint256).return: amounts of liquid tokens currently required to fully cover proposal

hasActiveDebts(address).return: True if sender has unpaid debts

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.lAmount: Amount of liquid tokens to repay

totalLDebts().return: Summ of all liquid token debts

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calculateInterestPayment(uint256,uint256.notice: Calculates interest amount for a debt

getRequiredPledge(address,uint256).notice: Calculates how many tokens are not yet covered by borrower or supporters

hasActiveDebts(address).notice: Check if user has active debts

repay(uint256,uint256).notice: Repay amount of lToken and unlock pTokens

withdrawUnlockedPledge(address,uint256).notice: Withdraw part of the pledge which is already unlocked (borrower repaid part of the debt) + interest
